page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: Cubs scouts brownies guides and scout band take place in the old school.In the village hall there are clubs for the adults Drama club, Womens Institute, Friendship club and good Companions for the older people. For young people there is Youth club, ballet and tap dancing Choir and Sunday school take place in St Johns church.A village cricket team and Junior and adults football.A lot of clubs take place in John Blandy School from 3.00 to 4.00 cricket, football, athletics, netball, chess,gymnastics and Natural History.There are evening activities like flower aranging, yoga and others acording to demand.There is a small play area with 6 swings, a fort, 6 pipes a rocking horse and a sand pit.A large play area is used for walking dogs and fairs.There is one pub at the cross roads of the A415 and A420.
